1993eb793d80776c429b3aceff81bcda11d2a61e.query:
INSERT INTO game_player (game_id, user_id, host)
            VALUES ((SELECT id FROM game WHERE public_id = $1),
                    (SELECT id FROM "user" WHERE public_id = $2),
                    $3);

4f28a11e3267ddedb4a7ad30b979c1f6b25067f7.query:
SELECT g.id, g.public_id, g.name, u.public_id host_public_id
            FROM game g
                     JOIN game_player gp ON g.id = gp.game_id
                     JOIN "user" u ON u.id = gp.user_id
            WHERE g.id > $1
              AND gp.host IS TRUE
            ORDER BY g.id
            LIMIT $2;

4f3928753865ac9a1921b558536fd084e5ab4a51.query:
UPDATE game
            SET name = $2
            WHERE public_id = $1

5d07a4376189e5da76a2e465d4a253cf1d02c9b6.query:
INSERT INTO game (public_id, name)
            VALUES ($1, $2)
            ON CONFLICT (public_id) DO UPDATE
                SET name = $2;

af420b56dccee77b4ec27b0a0ad004aa9d3901ff.query:
SELECT g.public_id, g.name, u.public_id host_public_id
            FROM game g
                     JOIN game_player gp ON g.id = gp.game_id
                     JOIN "user" u ON u.id = gp.user_id
            WHERE g.public_id = $1
              AND gp.host IS TRUE;

dabc471a760fcd9bc5dd348cc87bea7ab957173c.query:
SELECT u.public_id
            FROM "user" u
                     JOIN local l ON u.id = l.user_id
            WHERE l.public_id = $1;
